name: baserelayer
description: Open-source transaction relayer & meta-tx infrastructure for Base

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:contracts && npm run install:relayer && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:sdk
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:relayer && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:sdk
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:relayer && npm run test:backend && npm run test:sdk
scripts.lint: npm run lint:contracts && npm run lint:relayer && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:sdk

author: BaseRelayer Contributors
